title: WATCH:  Timelapse video shows monsoon thunderstorm over Las Vegas
description: Timelapse video shows monsoon thunderstorms moving across Las Vegas, bringing downpours and flooding in the area.

title: GOP lawmakers take aim at LGBTQ+ 'safe places' program in small Florida town
description: Some Florida lawmakers want to stop businesses from displaying rainbow decals.

title: Biden says 'I don't know' what happened with DeSantis meeting in Florida
description: President Joe Biden says he doesn't know what happened to plans for a meeting with Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis as he surveys Hurricane Idalia damage in Florida.

title: Russia says it thwarted attacks on Crimea bridge. Shelling and strikes leave at least 3 dead
description: Russia says its forces destroyed three Ukrainian naval drones being used in an attempt to attack a key bridge linking Russia to Moscow-annexed Crimea, temporarily closing it for a third time in less than a year

title: Former New Mexico Gov. Bill Richardson dies at 75
description: Former New Mexico Gov. Bill Richardson died at his summer home in Chatham, Massachusetts, the Richardson Center for Global Engagement announced Saturday. He was 75.

title: India launches a spacecraft to study the sun after successful landing near the moon's south pole
description: India has launched its first space mission to study the sun, less than two weeks after a successful uncrewed landing near the south pole region of the moon

title: WATCH:  Pup jumps with window washer
description: Button’s first encounter with a window cleaner was surely a fun one.

title: 'Margaritaville' singer Jimmy Buffett dies at 76
description: Jimmy Buffett -- famed singer, songwriter, musician and mogul -- has passed away at the age of 76.

title: Shooting at Louisiana high school football game kills 1 person and wounds another, police say
description: Police in Louisiana say a shooting during halftime of a high school football game left one victim dead and another wounded

title: WATCH:  Shark chasing seal almost knocks kayaker out of vessel
description: A kayaker captured his vessel almost flipping from a shark chasing a seal in Waihau Bay, New Zealand. The kayaker was unscathed, saying, "The scene was exhilarating and I was in awe."

title: Typhoon Saola makes landfall in southern China after nearly 900,000 people moved to safety
description: Typhoon Saola has made landfall in southern China after nearly 900,000 people moved to safety and most of Hong Kong and other parts of coastal southern China suspended business, transport and classes

title: North Korea fires cruise missiles into the sea after US-South Korean military drills end
description: South Korea says North Korea has test-fired several cruise missiles

title: Texas man pleads guilty to threatening Georgia public officials after 2020 election
description: The U.S. Justice Department says a Texas man has pleaded guilty to threatening Georgia officials following the 2020 election

title: Russia declares Nobel-winning editor Dmitry Muratov to be a foreign agent
description: Russian authorities have declared newspaper editor Dmitry Muratov to be a foreign agent, continuing the country’s moves to suppress critics and independent reporting

title: Man accused of abducting, murdering beloved teacher who went missing on walk
description: A Maryland man faces first-degree murder charges in connection with the disappearance of a beloved teacher who was abducted while out on a walk, police said.
